Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:29:58 UTC – Details)



【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

(as of Nov 30,2022 08:29:58 UTC – Details)

item.title: oneisall Dog Clippers with Double Blades,Cordless Small Pet Hair Grooming Trimmer,Low Noise for Trimming Dog’s Hair Around Paws, Eyes, Ears, Face, Rump (White)

Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming. Behind the “oneisall” brand is ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $66.98 - ($58.99 / Count)
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:22 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.8 x 4.92 x 1.85 inches; 7.83 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ C61
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included)
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B089W594LC

★ Quiet and Low Vibration Design: The dog clipper’s noise when working is about 60 db,ensure your pet is comfortable throughout the grooming process,without causing him any discomfort.
★Built-in Battery: Rechargeable by USB with indicator light, make it more convenient,without changing batteries. This nail trimmer can be used for about 2 hours after 2 hours of fully charging.
★Safe and Sharp Blade & Powerful Motor:Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade can provide excellent cutting performance. Works great for trimming small areas like paws,ears and eyes.
★What You Get: oneisall dog clipper set(with one small blade and one middle blade),one cleaning brush,one USB charging cord.

How to remove and install the blade?

1.Remove the blade counter clockwise rotation;

How to remove and install the blade?

2.Pull the blade out;

How to remove and install the blade?

3.Put the blade back to the clipper;

How to remove and install the blade?

4.Install the blade clockwise rotation.

Counter clockwise

Pull out

Put it back

Clockwise

4 Steps to Do Pet Hair Grooming

1. Bathing your dog,keep it clean with no dirt;

2. Grooming with a brush,remove the dirt and knots;

3.Shave dog hairs with oneisall dog clipper.

4.Use the dog trimmer to shave the small area hair.

Read more

From the brand

DEELOKI aims to “Healthy, Safety and comfortable ” life for pets. We all know that trimming pet nails is not an easy work, this unique pet nail grinder is specially made for pets with whisper quiet, fast and painless trimming.

The DEELOKI Pet Nail Grinder gives high performance grinding through any pets size.Lightweight with ultralight vibration it has amazing noise absorption.Your pet will love this amazingly simple solution to claw maintenance.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:52 UTC – Details)

From the brand

PetLab Co. Products

How did we get our start?

PetLab Co. was formed with a simple mission: to provide comfort and support for pets.

What makes our products unique?

If an ingredient is not beneficial then you won’t find it in our products. We work alongside experts to ensure that each ingredient is purposeful and up to our high standards.

Why do we love what we do?

Motivated by results and happy customers, we have created products that make a difference in both owners’ and pets’ lives. Producing delicious, simple, and effective supplements to support a healthy and active life.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.49 x 2.2 x 1.18 inches; 7.05 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ LPB1
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 21, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Petlab Co.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B4PGZJWJ
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

EASY TO APPLY: This paw soother balm comes in an easy-to-use twist stick, so you can quickly apply it to your pup’s paws before and after walks
MOISTURIZING DOG PAW BALM: In addition to soothing and moisturizing, this paw wax can also support your dog’s paws by providing a barrier from internal and external irritants
WORKS ALL YEAR LONG: Our dog paw moisturizer is ideal for both summer months, when paw licking can be at its height, and winter months, when paw dryness is more common
POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Thanks to its natural ingredients like organic shea butter and coconut oil, this dog paw balm is not only beneficial, but it’s also gentle
PREMIUM PRODUCTS – Our dog health supplies are exclusively manufactured in the USA with domestically and globally sourced ingredients

item.title: GHG Dog Nail Grinder Upgraded – Professional LED Lighting 3-Speed Rechargeable Pet Nail Trimmer with Clippers, Quiet Low Noise, Paws Grooming and Smoothing for Small Medium Large Dogs and Cats
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light

Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor

GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you to trim their claws . You can trim your pets nails professionally at home without any stress.

Get used to grinder

Step 1: Turn on the grinder and accustom your dog to the sound and smell, to avoid scaring your pet. Once your pets get used to it, the grinding work will be easy.

Cut the long nail

Step 2: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails.

Apply the grinder

Step 3: Put the electric nail grinder around the 60 oblique, Put pet’s nail gently into port hole with your fingers.

Reward your pet

Step 4: After finishing grinding, reward your pet with pet snacks it will have a good memory of the nail grinder.

Appropriate Angle

The perfect time to do claw grooming work after bathing, because their nails would be softer than usual and easier to trim. 45 degrees is a perfect angle for you to smooth pet’s nails.

（Do not sharpen one nail for too long to avoid heat buildup）

Low Noise Grinder

Our pet nail grinder has powerful motor with low noise and vibration will won’t scare your dog. 3 ports and Low-Normal-High speed are enough for all sizes of pet nails and heavy grinding.

Components

Pet Nail Grinder * 1

Pet Nail Clippers * 1

USB Charging Cable * 1

User Manual * 1

Different Ports * 2

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6 x 1.3 x 1.2 inches; 13.12 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Ion batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 11, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ GHG
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08SMD5DMD

SUPER LOW NOISE AND VIBRATION: Used as puppy nail grinder & cat nail trimmers, GHG nail grinder for pets won’t scare your canine. Enjoy grooming at home with GHG pet nail grinder for dogs quiet(＜40dB).
BUILT-IN LED LIGHT & LIGHTWEIGHT: A special LED light below the dog nail grinder shines on your pet’s claw so you can see it better, preventing over-grinding or cutting, portable and smart design.
UP TO 10H WORKING TIME: GHG nail grinders trimmer for dogs with convenient micro-USB charging, and its super long-life rechargeable battery-operated dog nail trimmer for easier at-home grooming.
1 NAIL CLIPPER & 1 ELECTRIC NAIL TRIMMER: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails, and flexibly choose the right port and speed according to the pet’s size and nail hardness.

GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you to trim their claws . You can trim your pets nails professionally at home without any stress.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Components Pet Nail Grinder * 1 Pet Nail Clippers * 1 Pet Nail File* 1 USB Charging Cable * 1 Cleaning Brush*1 User Manual * 1 Built-in Dual LED Lights & Superior Safety Super-bright 2 LED lights make you look at the nail location easier. Never worry about ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99 - $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 06:07:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Components

Pet Nail Grinder * 1 Pet Nail Clippers * 1 Pet Nail File* 1 USB Charging Cable * 1 Cleaning Brush*1 User Manual * 1

Built-in Dual LED Lights & Superior Safety

Super-bright 2 LED lights make you look at the nail location easier. Never worry about over-grinding.The independent LED light switch design allows you to turn on or off it according to different needs.

Upgraded Motor & Diamond Grinding Head

The new version of BDJ dog nail grinders with a powerful motor support heavy grinding. The power boosted by 20% makes fast and effective grinding.Upgraded diamond grinding makes more durable and reusable.

Low Noise Grinder < 50 db,Safer, Faster, Easier.

The upgraded BDJ dog nail grinder uses a superior motor with whisper-quiet technology.The low noise & low vibration makes your pets feel relaxed when grooming. Provide an efficient and comfortable nail grinding experience.

Advanced 3-Speed Switch & Smart LCD

The upgraded LCD design shows the current mode and battery capacity. It is more convenient to use.Adjustable 3-speed (7000-9000 RPM) & 3 grinding ports nail grinder is widely applied to small, medium, large pets, simply choose the appropriate port and speed depending on your pet’s size and nail hardness.

How to Groom Your Pets Nail Safely?

Step 1: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails first.

Step 2: Turn on the grinder and accustom your pet to the sound and smell to avoid scaring it.

Step 3: Put the electric nail grinder around the 45 oblique angles and trim the nails carefully.

Step 4: It’s necessary to treat your pet after every progress. Reward it with its favorite snacks.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.24 x 3.46 x 2.36 inches; 6.7 Ounces
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Ion batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 14, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ BDJ
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09QG4B94W

[ Advanced 3-Speed Switch & 3 Grinding Ports ] Low-high speed design powerful enough support heavy grinding. 3 ports fit all kinds of pets from small, medium and large pets. Choosing the appropriate port and speed according to the size of your pet’s nails. This truly is the perfect dog cat nail grinder.
[ Upgraded Smart LCD and Built in 2 LED Lights Design ] Allow you see the location of dog’s quick more easily and prevent over-grinding or cutting. Reducing the risk of hurting your pet or clipping the claws too short. Upgraded LCD will show you the current mode and battery capacity. It is more convenient for use.
[ Super Low Noise & Vibration ] High-quality motor makes grinder is ultra-quiet in 3 speed modes. The noise is controlled to 50dB while boosting the torque. Pets stays calm while grinding their nails.
[ Smart OS & Rechargeable Easily ] The powerful and intelligent management system greatly increases the service life of the dog nail grinder. And the USB wire can conveniently connect to a laptop, AC adapter or power bank to charge.
